meanings.definition: The combination or reconciliation of different beliefs or practices.
meanings.sent1: The syncretisms of various religions can be seen in the unique traditions of this community.
meanings.sent2: The syncretisms of Eastern and Western philosophies have created a new way of thinking.
meanings.sent3: At the cultural festival, the syncretisms of music and dance brought everyone together in harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a beautiful syncretisms of colors and shapes, blending seamlessly on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The syncretisms of flavors in the dish made it a culinary masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The merging or blending of different cultural elements.
meanings.sent1: The syncretisms of languages in this region reflect its diverse history.
meanings.sent2: In this city, you can see the syncretisms of architecture from different time periods.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show showcased the syncretisms of traditional and modern styles.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a beautiful syncretisms of colors and scents, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The syncretisms of customs and traditions made the celebration truly unique.
